info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 21 at 1:50PM CST until December 25 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 possible. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 16 possible. * WHERE...Coffee, Dale and Geneva Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Watch, from late Thursday night through Friday morning. For the second Hard Freeze Watch, from Friday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing
